title: Crime Alert 10.14.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.14.21
description:
A Good Samaritan stops to help after witnessing a multi-car crash, but one of the drivers involved in the wreck steals his car with his children still inside! A former reality star slams his girlfriend against a wall. Now, he's headed to prison.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
